title: About Me

content:
你好！

  • 我是Krodnel,目前是大二在读生
  • 我会在这里分享生活感想、学习记录与假期旅行游记
  • 希望以文字凝固时间，留下珍贵的回忆，直至生命与世界的尽头
  • 目前的单推： Enna Alouette
  • 欢迎你通过右侧信息栏找到我

Hi there!

  • I’m Krodnel, Sophomore in university currently.
  • I will share my life experiences， learning process and holiday travels here, hope you can enjoy my articles here.
  • I don’t live in a dream, The dream is my reality. Be a Dream Chaser!
  • Forever love Enna
